title: Stucco mihrab at the Mosque of Ibn Tulun
collector: Creswell, K. A. C. (Keppel Archibald Cameron), 1879-1974
description: Collector's note: Ibn Touloun (mosquée) Kiblah auxiliaire. Sept. of cent. aisle - 2nd row B. Sagin - bqb (12qb). Translation of note: Ibn Tulun (mosque) Auxiliary kiblah. Seventh of cent.
date-created: ca. late 19th century or early 20th century
collection: K.A.C. Creswell Photographs of Islamic Architecture
source: From: Stucco mihrab at the Mosque of Ibn Tulun
